channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Emma Watson Cannot Have It Both Ways in Her Feud with J. K. Rowling
item.description: The famous author, naturally, saw right through the actress’s artifice.

item.title: The Great Relearning
item.description: We are caught in a cycle of forgetting, then rediscovering, society’s most obvious lessons.

item.description: Some migrants being held in the immigration detention center in Tacoma, Washington, have the right to request to be released on bond, under a federal ...

item.title: Newly elected Arizona lawmaker has yet to be sworn into office, as House Democrats welcome her
item.description: A week after her decisive win in an Arizona special election, Adelita Grijalva arrived at the U.S. Capitol, where her father had served for decades.

item.title: 2500% Spike In Google Search Results For ‘Trump’ And ‘Fascist’ Shows Dems’ Violence Incitement Problem
item.description: Democrats and their allies in media, academia, rent-a-mob, and activist circles have ramped up incendiary language.

item.description: The longtime Trump adviser marvels at liberals claiming Trump is weaponizing justice after Democrats weaponized justice.

item.title: ‘That Era Is OVER’: FBI Ends ADL Partnership After TPUSA ‘Extremist’ Designation
item.description: 'This FBI formally rejects Comey’s policies and any partnership with the ADL,' Patel said in a statement.

item.title: States Should Beware Legal ‘Double-Dipping’
item.description: Amid an ethics epidemic, states should kick the tires on outside counsel contracts.

item.title: Argentina’s Need for ‘Politics Without Romance’
item.description: Argentina requires profound structural changes that go beyond Milei himself.

item.title: Why Demon Slayer Speaks To The Soul And Disney Doesn’t
item.description: The problem isn’t that Americans are watching Japanese anime; it’s that Hollywood has stopped telling the kind of stories that 'set hearts ablaze.'

item.title: Why The Left Lionizes Communist Cop Killer Assata Shakur
item.description: Media outlets and activists glorify Shakur as a revolutionary, but her life of crime and violence tells a far less heroic story.

item.title: You Actually Don’t Want to Drive Your Opponents Crazy
item.description: Republicans are imitating Obama’s approach by needling Democratic voters to the point that they take leave of their senses. And it could backfire.
